mapper.insert: insert into yeps_member_photos(filenum, mnum, member_filename, origin_filename, filesize, file_upload_date, ismainphoto) values (yeps_member_photos_seq.nextval, #{mnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{member_filename}, #{origin_filename}, #{filesize}, sysdate, 'y')

insert into yeps_member_photos(filenum, mnum, member_filename, origin_filename, filesize, file_upload_date, ismainphoto) values (yeps_member_photos_seq.nextval, #{mnum, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{member_filename}, #{origin_filename}, #{filesize}, sysdate, 'n')
mapper.select: select * from yeps_member_photos where mnum = #{mnum} order by filenum asc
select count(*) from yeps_member_photos where mnum = #{mnum} and ismainphoto = 'y'
select * from yeps_member_photos where mnum = #{mnum} and ismainphoto = 'y'
mapper.update: update yeps_member_photos set ismainphoto='n' where mnum=#{mnum}
update yeps_member_photos set ismainphoto='y' where mnum=#{mnum} and filenum=#{filenum}
mapper.delete: delete yeps_member_photos where mnum = #{mnum} and filenum=#{filenum}
